sn45.38:1.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you life as a brahmin and the goal of life as a brahmin.
sn45.38:1.4: And what is life as a brahmin?
sn45.38:1.5: It is simply this noble eightfold path, that is:
sn45.38:1.6: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
sn45.38:1.7: This is called life as a brahmin.
sn45.38:1.8: And what is the goal of life as a brahmin?
sn45.38:1.9: The ending of greed, hate, and delusion.
sn45.38:1.10: This is called the goal of life as a brahmin.”
